metadata.title: CVE-2022-20448 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In buzzBeepBlinkLocked of NotificationManagerService.java, there is apossible way to share data across users due to a permissions bypass. Thiscould lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid-13Android ID: A-237540408

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
